verses.verse: <S%G2233>Let<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2218>yoke<s%> <S%G2233>count<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G1319>teaching<s%> <S%G987>is<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4103>believing<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%>, let <S%G2706>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G3754>them<s%>, because they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G1398>do<s%> them <S%G1398>service<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G482>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2108>benefit<s%>. These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> teaches <S%G2085>otherwise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4334>consents<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5198>wholesome<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>, even <S%G3588>the<s%> words of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G1319>teaching<s%> which is according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>;

He is <S%G5187>proud<s%>, <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3552>harping<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> disputes of <S%G3055>words<s%>, <S%G3739>from<s%> <S%G1537>which<s%> <S%G1096>comes<s%> <S%G5355>envy<s%>, <S%G2054>strife<s%>, <S%G988>railings<s%>, <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G5283>surmisings<s%>,

Perverse <S%G3859>disputings<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G1311>corrupt<s%> <S%G3563>minds<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G650>destitute<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>, supposing <S%G3543>that<s%> <S%G4200>gain<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>: <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> withdraw <S%G868>yourself<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G841>contentment<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4200>gain<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> this <S%G2889>world<s%>, and it is <S%G1212>certain<s%> we <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1627>carry<s%> <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G1627>out<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1305>food<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4629>clothes<s%> let us <S%G714%G99999>be<s%> <S%G714>content<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> they that <S%G1014>will<s%> be <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3803>snare<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> into <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G983>hurtful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1036>drown<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G684>perdition<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the love of <S%G5365>money<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>: <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3713>while<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> coveted <S%G3713>after<s%>, they have <S%G635>erred<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4044>pierced<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G4044>through<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3601>sorrows<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5343>flee<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> follow <S%G1377>after<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2150>godliness<s%>, <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G4236>meekness<s%>.

<S%G75>Fight<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, lay hold <S%G1949>on<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3739>where<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> you <S%G2564>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G3670>professed<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>profession<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>.

I <S%G3853>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3853>charge<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G2227>quickens<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> before <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3140>who<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>confession<s%>;

<S%G5083>That<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> this <S%G1785>commandment<s%> without <S%G784>spot<s%>, <S%G423>unrebukeable<s%>, <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> in <S%G2398>his<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> he shall <S%G1166>show<s%>, who is the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1413>Potentate<s%>, the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G936>kings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2961>lords<s%>;

<S%G2192>Who<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G110>immortality<s%>, living <S%G3611>in<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> which no man can <S%G676>approach<s%>; <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> has <S%G1492>seen<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%>: to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2904>power<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G3853>Charge<s%> them that are <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3568>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, that they <S%G5309>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5309>highminded<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G83>uncertain<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G3930>gives<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G4146>richly<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G619>enjoy<s%>;
That they do <S%G14>good<s%>, that they be <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, ready to <S%G2130>distribute<s%>, willing to <S%G2843>share<s%>;

Laying up in <S%G597>store<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the time to <S%G3195>come<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may lay hold <S%G1949>on<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, <S%G5442>keep<s%> that which is committed to your <S%G3872>trust<s%>, <S%G1624>avoiding<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> and vain <S%G2757>babblings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G477>oppositions<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> falsely so <S%G5581>called<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1861>professing<s%> have <S%G795>erred<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>. <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.
